title: Where to report a person who was boosted?
body: I found somebody that was boosted but i do not know where to boost this person? also will my name show up if i report the summoner for boosting? Thanks (:

replies.body: You're free to report them in the post game lobby after the match.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=N7AAXc2m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-27T21:43:04.271+0000)
>
> You're free to report them in the post game lobby after the match.

i think there needs to be a report in like a friends tab or something only having in game can screw you if league bugs.
